channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: These great Cyber Monday tech deals will likely be gone tomorrow
item.description: December is kicking off with a bang. Cyber Monday is today, and it’s one of your last chances to score major deals before the holiday rush plows us all over. It’s a great moment to snag gadgets — many of which have been tested by The Verge — at (or close to) all-time lows if […]

item.title: Mars : cette mystérieuse tache verte intrigue les scientifiques de la Nasa
item.description: Et si ces petites taches vertes découvertes par Perseverance lors de l’observation d’une roche martienne étaient enfin la preuve tant attendue que Mars a bien abrité une vie extraterrestre ? Pour l’heure, rien ne le confirme et rien ne l’infirme. L’espoir est donc permis !

item.title: Cyber Monday isn’t over yet: the M1 MacBook Air is just $499
item.description: Not the most powerful, but a wild deal for the price

item.title: The best Apple deals you can still shop in Cyber Monday’s final hours
item.description: If you’re planning to gift an Apple device this holiday season — or treat yourself — time is now running out to take advantage of the latest Cyber Monday promos. The annual shopping holiday is already down to its final hours, and we’re starting to see some items go up in price or out of stock. […]

item.title: Only a few hours left! Get the Razer Basilisk V3 X HyperSpeed at nearly 50% off
item.description: Best Buy has a time attached to this deal, so you know it means business. Don't wait for this deal to disappear!

item.title: These Verge-approved gifts are still available for up to 60 percent off for Cyber Monday
item.description: If you’re hoping to whittle down your wish list before the holiday panic truly sets in, Cyber Monday presents a prime opportunity. Many of the tech-y gifts we recommend for Christmas, graduation, Mother’s Day, and other celebratory events throughout the year are receiving their steepest discounts to date. These aren’t random picks, either; they’re items […]...

item.title: What does it mean when Uncle Sam is one of your biggest shareholders? Chip startup xLight is about to find out
item.description: You can imagine how this is all going over in Silicon Valley, where the libertarian ethos runs deep.

item.title: Cyber Monday Kindle deals are still live - here are two bundles I recommend before they're gone
item.description: The Amazon Kindle Colorsoft bundle with a charging dock and the Amazon Kindle Scribe Essentials bundle are both at all-time low prices and come with deluxe accessories worth having.

item.title: Samsung officialise le Galaxy Z TriFold : un écran de 10 pouces qui tient dans la poche
item.description: La course au "Tri-Fold" est lancée. Quelques mois après le choc Huawei Mate XT, Samsung réplique enfin. Le Galaxy Z TriFold n'est pas un prototype : c'est un monstre de puissance avec Snapdragon 8 Elite et une charnière en titane. Mais attention, la facture risque d'être salée.

item.title: Last chance Cyber Monday Apple deals – shop record-low prices on AirPods, iPads, MacBooks, and more
item.description: Cyber Monday Apple deals are ending soon, and I'm rounding up all the best offers still available, featuring record-low prices on AirPods, iPads, MacBooks, and more.
